events.message: The candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the software engineer position with a detailed resume and portfolio.
Application has been categorised under Engineering based on the keywords such as software engineer and developer mentioned in the resume.
Recruiter Sarah Lee has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process for the software engineer role.
Initial phone screening completed successfully; candidate showed strong understanding of software development concepts.
Candidate John expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage and confirmed availability next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM with the engineering panel to assess coding skills.
